forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 46. South southwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West wind 1 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening unfolds, Downtown San Francisco greets you with a serene tranquility, its skyline slowly softening under the subtle embrace of clear skies. The deepening twilight kisses the landmarks, while the gentle south-southwest wind whispers through the streets, promising a chill that lingers, urging you to zip up your jacket as temperatures hover around a cool 46 degrees. It’s a moment suspended in time, where the city seems to breathe in the quietness, inviting you to pause and appreciate the stillness.

As dawn approaches, a fresh day beckons, clad in the optimism of mostly sunny skies. The sun will stretch over the horizon, bringing warmth that hovers near 62 degrees. Yet, don’t be fooled; a soft transition into the afternoon will see temperatures retreating to a milder 58, making layered clothing a wise choice. With a light westward breeze dancing through, it’s the kind of day that elicits an urge to wander. Venture out for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, perhaps savoring a warm beverage while enjoying the gentle rhythm of the waves, or explore the quaint cafés that line the streets, each offering a cozy nook to indulge in. This day is not just a canvas painted with sunshine, but a pleasant call to experience the understated beauty of urban life.
